mapper.insert: insert into reviewBoard (num, w_date, title, contents, shop_name, shop_add, hit, ref, recommend) values ( reviewBoard_num.NEXTVAL, sysdate, #{title}, #{contents}, #{shop_name}, #{shop_add}, 0, 0, 0 )
mapper.select: select ceil(COUNT(num)/10) as page from reviewBoard
mapper.update: update reviewBoard set hit=hit+1 where num=#{num}
mapper.insert: insert into reviewComment (num, cnum, w_date, contents) values ( #{num}, reviewComment_num.NEXTVAL, sysdate, #{contents} )
mapper.select: select c.num, c.cnum, c.contents, c.w_date from reviewBoard r INNER JOIN reviewComment c on r.num=c.num where r.num=#{num} order by c.cnum
select count(cnum) from reviewBoard r INNER JOIN reviewComment c on r.num=c.num where r.num=#{num}
mapper.update: update reviewComment set contents=#{contents} where cnum=#{cnum} and num=#{num}
update reviewBoard set title=#{title} shop_name=#{shop_name} shop_add=#{shop_add} contents=#{contents} where num=#{num}
